div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 227 Archanes, Crete, 1960 Burial: c. 200-175 B.C. (T) Contents: 2+ AR, 4+ AE Axus: 3 AE Gortyna: 1 AE Itanus: 1 ob. Rhodes: 1 dr. Disposition: Athens 6 Varoucha, Pepragmena tou B' Diethnous Kretolo- gikou Synedriou, 2 (Athens, 1968), pp. 214-5 This hd. may originally have contained 33 pieces
